articles.title: The government of the future doesn't need these departments | Opinion
articles.description: Andrew MacDougall: What would Canada's core needs be from a slimmed-down government? Not the National Film Board or Accessibility Standards Canada.

articles.title: Cost of U.S.-supplied equipment for Canada’s new warships triples to $3.6B
articles.description: The increase to $3.6 billion is mainly for what is called non-major defence equipment and includes a U.S. navigation system and U.S. command systems.

articles.title: Putin says there are points he can’t agree to in the US proposal to end Russia’s war in Ukraine
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin says some proposals in a U.S. plan to end the war in Ukraine are unacceptable to the Kremlin, indicating in comments published Thursday that any deal is still some ways off. articles.title: Gemini was Google’s top trending search term in 2025
articles.description: Gemini wasn’t the only AI chatbot to make the list, as DeepSeek ranked seventh among the year’s trending searches.

articles.title: Uganda stops granting refugee status for Eritreans, Somalis and Ethiopians
articles.description: Government once seen as progressive on migration says aid cuts to blame for excluding countries ‘not experiencing war’The Ugandan government has stopped granting asylum and refugee status to people from Eritrea, Somalia and Ethiopia, citing severe funding shortfalls for the significant policy shift.

articles.title: Hornet-eating frog shows remarkable venom resistance
articles.description: Experiments reveal that pond frogs can eat highly venomous hornets without suffering noticeable damage, even after repeated stings. Most frogs successfully consumed hornets, including the notorious Asian giant hornet. This unusual resilience suggests that frogs may have evolved mechanisms to block t

articles.title: Meta starts kicking Australian children off Instagram and Facebook
articles.description: The tech giant will begin closing accounts for under 16s, a week before an official ban.

articles.title: Hong Kong residents and experts defend bamboo scaffolding after deadly fire
articles.description: Hong Kong residents, construction professionals and former senior officials are pushing back against the idea that bamboo scaffolding was a main reason flames spread so quickly in the city’s deadliest blaze in decades, as a debate flares over whether it should be replaced. articles.title: Hidden Game: Caufield scores in shootout to beat Jets

articles.title: 'Not becoming of a president': Somali-Americans respond to Trump's 'garbage' remarks
articles.description: Somali-Americans tell of their heightened fear after the US president intensified his criticism of the community.

articles.title: Luigi Mangione’s court hearing continues on anniversary of UnitedHealthcare CEO’s killing
articles.description: A high-stakes hearing in the New York murder case against Luigi Mangione continues Thursday, a year to the day after prosecutors say he gunned down UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.
